title: ManifestMetadataConfig
description: Definition of the manifest file containing entries to be ingested across multiple buckets as object storage entries

manifestMetadataEntry.description: Config properties for a container found in a user-supplied metadata config

containerName.title: Container Name
containerName.description: The top-level container name containing the data path to be ingested

dataPath.title: Data path
dataPath.description: The path where the data resides in the container, excluding the bucket name

structureFormat.title: Schema format
structureFormat.description: What's the schema format for the container, eg. avro, parquet, csv.

separator.title: Separator
separator.description: For delimited files such as CSV, what is the separator being used?

isPartitioned.title: Is Partitioned
isPartitioned.description: Flag indicating whether the container's data is partitioned

partitionColumns.title: Partition Columns
partitionColumns.description: What are the partition columns in case the container's data is partitioned

entries.description: List of metadata entries for the bucket containing information about where data resides and its structure
